title: Find a Doctor
description: Leslie E. Lehmann, MD - Pediatric Hematology/Oncology. Dr. Lehmann attended Harvard College and received her MD from Duke University Medical School, where, after finishing a pediatric residency, she spent a year as chief resident. She completed a pediatric hematology-oncology fellowship at DFCI/Children's Hospital Boston in 1996 and subsequently joined the facult...
